title: WTS/WTT T206 Wiltse Portrait - Poor - $15 OBO
author: G1911

posts.post_title: WTS/WTT T206 Wiltse Portrait - Poor - $15 OBO
posts.post_content:
Ended up getting a second copy of this card with the same back, so want to send it to someone who can use it.

$15 OBO in a PWE.  Will also happily trade for another beat T206/T206/cheap card

The card is ALTERED - it is missing a corner and the big stain has altered the stock, thickening the card (not brittle, just thicker).  This card is in very poor condition, as you can see :).  Authenticity is unconditionally and fully guaranteed.
